posts.post_content:
Cmon, this is NOT the worst card in magic. The worst card in magic is most certainly [Break Open](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Break Open).  
  
Think about it this way- if you the option of just playing Ashenmoor Cohort for free with no drawbacks whatsoever, you'd do it, right? I mean, a 4/3 creature with a stupid ability is at least better than nothing.  
  
If you had the option of playing Break Open for free though, there is NO WAY you would take that option. In 98% of games it would just do nothing. In the 2% of games in which it could actually target something, you STILL wouldn't want to play it because its obviously insane to turn a colorless, ability-less 2/2 into an Akroma, Angel of Wrath.
posts.html:
Cmon, this is NOT the worst card in magic. The worst card in magic is most certainly Break Open.

Think about it this way- if you the option of just playing Ashenmoor Cohort for free with no drawbacks whatsoever, you'd do it, right? I mean, a 4/3 creature with a stupid ability is at least better than nothing.

If you had the option of playing Break Open for free though, there is NO WAY you would take that option. In 98% of games it would just do nothing. In the 2% of games in which it could actually target something, you STILL wouldn't want to play it because its obviously insane to turn a colorless, ability-less 2/2 into an Akroma, Angel of Wrath.
